Title: Provides for any city, town or village in the state of New York to control the town speed limits
Summary: Provides for any city, town or village in the state of New York to control the town speed limits.
LawCode: Amd ยง1662-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to regulating speed limits in cities, towns, or villages
